Text: RE Denver Travel ProfilesArrangers Cc Zou Hello I hope you had a good flight back to Texas Thank you very much for your visit to the Denver location I found it very informative I faxed over travel profiles to your office for the Enron North America Denver employees I am now requesting the right to make travel using ClickTrip on behalf of the employees in our office Mark Whitt Paul Lucci Theresa Staab and Tyrell Harrison Please set me Heidi DuBose up as their travel arranger Thank you again for the meeting Sincerely Heidi DuBose Heidi DuBose Enron North America ph fx
Just a reminderJust a reminder I have a travel meeting over at Crestone starting at am this morning Itll probably last about hours or so Heidi DuBose Enron North America ph fx

FW Lucci oct Denver to HoustonETKTEmail copy for your records Original Message From Julie Hunt mailto Sent Tuesday September AM To DuBose Heidi Subject Lucci oct Denver to HoustonETKT AGENT JHJH BOOKING REF YTHCI LUCCIPAUL ENRON TH STREET SUITE DENVER CO ATTN HEIDI DUBOSE DATE SEP ENRONDEN SERVICE DATE FROM TO DEPART ARRIVE CONTINENTAL AIRLINES OCT DENVER CO HOUSTON TX P P CO B MON DENVER INTL GBUSH INTERCO TERMINAL C SNACK NON STOP RESERVATION CONFIRMED DURATION AIRCRAFT MCDONNELL DOUGLAS MD ALL SERIES SEAT C NO SMOKING CONFIRMED LUCCIPAUL HOTEL OCT DOUBLETREE HOTEL HOUSTONALLEN CENTER OCT DALLAS STREET HOUSTON TX UNITED STATES OF AMERICA TELEPHONE FAX TELEX TLX NONE CONFIRMATION REFERENCE DKENR SINGLE ROOM KING SIZE BED RATE ENR USD PER NIGHT GUARANTEE GIVEN ZD HOUR CANCEL POLICY AT THE DOUBLETREE ALLEN CTR CONTINENTAL AIRLINES OCT HOUSTON TX DENVER CO P P CO V WED GBUSH INTERCO DENVER INTL TERMINAL C NON STOP RESERVATION CONFIRMED DURATION AIRCRAFT BOEING SEAT C NO SMOKING CONFIRMED LUCCIPAUL AIR FARE TAX TOTAL USD AIR TOTAL USD INVOICE TOTAL USD PAYMENT CCVIA RESERVATION NUMBERS COUDSQ LUCCIPAUL TICKETCOETKT CO FREQUENT FLYER COSU CONTINENTAL RECORD LOCATOR UDSQ THIS IS A TICKETLESS RESERVATION PLEASE HAVE A PICTURE ID AVAILABLE AT THE AIRPORT THANK YOU NONREFUNDABLE TKT MINIMUM CHANGE FEE THANK YOU FOR CALLING VITOL TRAVEL Vitol Travel Services Fargo Houston Tx Do You Yahoo Get email alerts NEW webcam video instant messaging with Yahoo Messenger

FW LUCCI JACKSON HOLE ITIN CHANGEPlease disregard your other itinerary for the Jackson trip We had to make some changes so here is your NEW schedule Original Message From JAN SKOOG mailto Sent Wednesday September AM To DuBose Heidi Subject LUCCI JACKSON HOLE ITIN CHANGE AGENT JSJS BOOKING REF YUXEH LUCCIPAUL ENRON TH STREET SUITE DENVER CO ATTNHEIDI DUBOSE DATE SEP SERVICE DATE FROM TO DEPART ARRIVE UNITED AIRLINES SEP DENVER CO JACKSON WY A A UA V WED DENVER INTL JACKSON HOLE NON STOP RESERVATION CONFIRMED DURATION FLIGHT OPERATED BY UNITED EXPAWAC AIRCRAFT BRITISH AEROSPACE SEAT A NO SMOKING CONFIRMED LUCCIPAUL UNITED AIRLINES SEP JACKSON WY DENVER CO A A UA V FRI JACKSON HOLE DENVER INTL NON STOP RESERVATION CONFIRMED DURATION FLIGHT OPERATED BY UNITED EXPAWAC AIRCRAFT BRITISH AEROSPACE SEAT D NO SMOKING CONFIRMED LUCCIPAUL RESERVATION NUMBERS UAMNPSW UA FREQUENT FLYER UA NONREFUNDABLE TKT MINIMUM CHANGE FEE THIS IS A TICKETLESS RESERVATION PLEASE HAVE A PICTURE ID AVAILABLE AT THE AIRPORT THANK YOU THANK YOU FOR CALLING VITOL TRAVEL VITOL TRAVEL LOUISIANA STE HOUSTON TX PHONE FAX Terrorist Attacks on US How can you help Donate cash emergency relief information fcUSEmergencyInformation

Request from Denver ENAGerald Our landlord here in Denver Equity Office is requesting a formal notice of Enron North America Corps name change from Enron Capital and Trade Resources Apparently on our lease it says Enron Capital and Trade Resources but in the rd Amendment it reads Enron North America Corp Equity says they need a copy of what was sent in for the official name change Im not sure if you have something we can give them Please let me know I appreciate your help Thank you Heidi DuBose Enron North America ph fx

FW BRUCE SPOSI ETICKET ITINERARY NOV TRAVELOriginal Message From Madeleine Cardoso mailto Sent Wednesday October PM To DuBose Heidi Subject RE BRUCE SPOSI ETICKET ITINERARY NOV TRAVEL AGENT MCMC BOOKING REF YPBR SPOSIBRUCE ATTN MARK WHITT TH ST ENRON CORP SUITE DENVER CO ETKT RECEIPT DATE OCT SERVICE DATE FROM TO DEPART ARRIVE CONTINENTAL AIRLINES NOV DENVER CO HOUSTON TX P P CO K THU DENVER INTL GBUSH INTERCO TERMINAL C NON STOP RESERVATION CONFIRMED DURATION AIRCRAFT BOEING SEAT C NO SMOKING CONFIRMED SPOSIBRUCEIDS ONLY AN EXIT ROW AISLE WAS AVAILABLE ON FLIGHT CO HOTEL NOV HYATT REGENCY HOUSTON NOV LOUISIANA STREET HOUSTON TX UNITED STATES OF AMERICA TELEPHONE FAX CONFIRMATION HY REFERENCE KIGPREF SINGLE ROOM RATE ENR USD PER NIGHT GUARANTEE GIVEN ENRON CORP TO AVOID BILLING CANCEL BY PM DAY OF ARRIVAL LOWER HOTEL RATES MAY BECOME AVAILABLE PLEASE INQUIRE AT CHK IN CONTINENTAL AIRLINES NOV HOUSTON TX DENVER CO P P CO B FRI GBUSH INTERCO DENVER INTL TERMINAL C NON STOP RESERVATION CONFIRMED DURATION AIRCRAFT BOEING SEAT C NO SMOKING CONFIRMED SPOSIBRUCEIDS ONLY AN EXIT ROW AISLE WAS AVAILABLE ON FLIGHT CO THIS IS A NONREFUNDABLE FARE THAT REQUIRES TRAVEL ON THESE SPECIFIC DATES AND FLIGHTS ANY CHANGES WILL RESULT IN A PENALTY ANDOR ADDITIONAL COLLECTION MISCELLANEOUS MAR HOUSTON TX SAT THANK YOU FOR USING THE TAP RESERVATION NUMBERS COVZBB SPOSIBRUCE SCR TICKETCOETKT ASSISTANT HEIDI DUBOSE INTL TVLRS CARRY SOS WALLET CARD WENRON ASSISTANCE INFO CALL SOS MEDICAL EMERGENCYIN US CALL SOS MEDICAL EMERGENCYINTL COLLECT CREDIT CARD USED MARK WHITT NEW FAA REQUIREMENTS CHECK IN AT LEAST HOURS PRIOR TO FLIGHT DEPARTURE FOR DOMESTIC HOURS FOR INTERNATIONAL TO GO THROUGH SECURITY YOU ARE REQUIRED TO HAVE AN ITINERARY GENERATED BY AN AIRLINE OR TRAVEL AGENCY CONFIRMING AN ELECTRONIC TICKET INCLUDING TICKET NUMBER OR A RECEIPT FOR AN ELECTRONIC TICKET INCLUDING TICKET NUMBER ANDOR A BOARDING PASS FOR THE CURRENT DAY THIS IS THE PASSENGER RECEIPT FOR YOUR ELECTRONIC TICKET PLEASE CHECKIN WITH PHOTO IDENTIFICATION AND WITH EITHER THIS RECEIPT OR YOUR CONFIRMATION NUMBER YOUR ETKT CONFIRMATION NUMBER IS VZBB ETICKET ISSUED OCT

RE Enron AllEmployee Meeting NoticeI called and have this set up for Denver to be Video Conferenced in on this meeting Original Message From Whitt Mark Sent Monday October AM To DuBose Heidi Subject FW Enron AllEmployee Meeting Notice Can we get this Original Message From Office of the Chairman mailtoOfficeoftheChairmanENRONcom Sent Monday October AM To All Enron NRON Subject Enron AllEmployee Meeting Notice To All Enron Employees Please join us at an allemployee meeting at am Houston time Tuesday October in the Hyatt Regency Houstons Imperial Ballroom We will review third quarter financial and operating highlights and action steps were taking based on the results of the Lay It On the Line survey We welcome your questions Please send them to Courtney Votaw by email fax or interoffice mail EB B We look forward to seeing you there Ken Greg and Mark Accessing the Meeting via Streaming VideoAudio If you are a Houstonbased employee and cant attend the meeting or if you are located in London Calgary Toronto Omaha New York or Portland ENA you can access the live event at employeemeeting Enron Europe employees will receive a followup message from their Public Relations team concerning online access to the meeting Video Teleconferencing The meeting will be made available by video teleconference to employees in Sao Paulo Buenos Aires Dubai Rio de Janeiro Bothell Wash and Chicago IL If your location would like to participate by video teleconference please contact Yvonne Francois at Audio Via Telephone For those of you who cannot view the live event by video stream or video teleconferencing you can access the meeting via telephone by dialing the following numbers The host will ask you what call or event you will be connecting to reply Enron United States International If you encounter technical difficulties please contact your IT help desk

RE Concur Expense Document MW Cc Barry The Jackson Hole Lodging Huff House for Mark and Paul was all charged on Marks card The way the lodging was broken up is as follows rooms night stay per night per room tax So actual charges for Mark Whitt was and for Paul Lucci was for a grand total of Paul has not given me his receipts from this trip just yet but the only major travel associated charges he should have to expense would be airfare which was As Mark also had the rental car charged to his expenses Please let me know if you need anything further on this or if you have questions Thanks Heidi Original Message From Whitt Mark Sent Friday October PM To DuBose Heidi Cc Tycholiz Barry Subject FW Concur Expense Document MW Heidi Please sum up my costs and Pauls cost for this trip and forward to Barry Barry All of the Hotel costs were on my credit card so all Paul should have is his airfare and incidentals But we will sum it up for you Original Message From Tycholiz Barry Sent Thursday October AM To Whitt Mark Subject FW Concur Expense Document MW Mark I have approved this expense report With regards to the Wyoming Gas Fair What is the total cost of that trip for youlooks like or so including airfare hotel and ancillaries also I believe Paul was there What are his expenses going to be for this Thanks BT Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday October PM To Tycholiz Barry Subject Concur Expense Document MW The following expense report is ready for approval Employee Name Mark Whitt Status last changed by Automated Administrator Expense Report Name MW Report Total Amount Due Employee To approve this expense report click on the following link for Concur Expense

FW Our Response to the US TragedyOriginal Message From Enron NRON mailtoIMCEANOTESEnronAnnouncementsCorpEnron NRONcom On Behalf Of Ken Lay Chairman NRON Sent Thursday September PM To All Enron NRON Subject Our Response to the US Tragedy The tragedy of Tuesday September will serve as an unforgettable reminder to people all over the world of what is truly important and of lifes fragility My heartfelt sympathies go out to the families and friends of all the people whose lives were taken in this senseless and horrific attack I ask that all of you keep our deceased colleague Nick Humber and his family in your thoughts and prayers Tragically Nick a director with Enron Wind was on one of the planes hijacked on Tuesday To help with relief efforts in New York and Washington DC Enron will make a total contribution of million dollars to be split equally between the American Red Cross and the New York Firefighters and Police Officers Fund Many of you have expressed an interest in more personal involvement and I want you to be aware of some of the options available I encourage you to support those impacted by this tragedy by donating to relief efforts and to take advantage of our Matching Gift Program to double the impact of your individual donation Because of the significance of this tragic event Enron will match your contribution for How to Help Please go to wwweasymatchcomenron Once there click on Disaster Relief located in the middle of the top of the page Please choose from the list of nonprofits that are accepting donations to help with this effort Any donations made to aid with disaster relief will not be counted toward the annual Matching Gift limit You will need your GIS number to do this it begins with a If you are unsure of your GIS number please contact the HR GIM helpdesk at We will have red white and blue striped ribbons in Houston for employees to pin on their shirts in memory of those who lost their lives in honor of those who survived and for their families Donations to the New York Firefighters and Police Officers Fund and other organizations are being accepted in exchange for the ribbons Enron will also match these donations The ribbons are available tomorrow from am at the InfoZone which is located by the down escalator in the lobby For any other employees who would like to make donations please go to the above website Enron employees are generously giving blood and we will continue to work with relief efforts to ensure that employees who want to give have the ability to do so If you have questions call President Bush has declared Friday a day of National Prayer and Remembrance and is calling on Americans to use their lunch breaks to go to places of worship to pray for victims and their families Following is a list of websites with additional information o ktrk o contentcommunityreligious o If you are looking for a service within walking distance of the Enron building First United Methodist Church corner of Main and Clay and Antioch Missionary Baptist Church will hold prayer services on Friday First United Methodist Church will have services at am noon and pm Antioch Missionary Baptist Church will have a service at noon o If you are interested in attending a service and dont work in this area please check your local television websites for more information For Houston employees a citywide candlelight vigil will be held on the steps of City Hall in Downtown Houston at pm tomorrow night Mayor Lee Brown will be speaking At am Central on Monday September th in Enron facilities around the world we will have a moment of silence in memory of those whose lives have been tragically taken We ask that you put down the phone turn away from your computer and dedicate a personal moment of silence together with your coworkers We encourage all US based employees to wear red white or blue shirts on Monday For Counseling Assistance For employees in Houston we have an onsite employee assistance counselor in the building that you can reach by calling If you are not located in Houston or if you or a family member would prefer an offsite counselor you can call the hour Employee Assistance Program number Employees outside the US can also contact directly United HealthGroup Enrons medical network administrator has provided free access to their National Disaster Line for counseling service to any person That number is We are also working to bring crisis counseling to any work location that has a need This is an agonizing time for our nation and it is hard for us all In addition to the financial and human support we are extending to those in need it is imperative that we at Enron continue to safely and reliably serve our customers in the US and around the world We know it is difficult but we must demonstrate ongoing stability and strength at Enron as this will serve as a signal that the ideals upon which America was founded cannot be diminished Again our hearts go out to the families and friends of those who have lost loved ones in this tragedy Please continue to watch your email for more information
